title: Fears ancient villages could be erased by 'Forest City'
description: West Suffolk MP Nick Timothy has blasted proposals for a Forest City, which could affect between Haverhill and Newmarket, in his constituency.

title: Brick by Brick: Gilsum Man Looks to Revive an Ancient Stove-building Technique
description: This time of year, many of us are faced with the inevitable expense of heating our homes. With the rising costs of firewood, fuel and electricity, it can be an annual stressor on both our minds and wallets.

title: New 'guardian' for important ancient hillfort in Cornwall
description: It dates from around the fourth to first centuries BCE and is part of Cornish legend.

title: OPEC wants a rethink of label ‘fossil fuel’
description: Narrative shifting to “energy addition” from “energy transition”

title: Black Desert Mobile Adds Safety Net for Item Upgrades with New Ancient Anvil Feature - GamerBraves
description: Black Desert Mobile Adds Safety Net for Item Upgrades with New Ancient Anvil Feature GamerBravesBlack Desert Mobile's new Ancient Anvil system set to significantly ease progression Pocket Gamer
